title: Davidvictorson
author: Davidvictorson
created_time: July 14, 2022, 06:10:16 PMLast edit: July 14, 2022, 06:49:17 PM by Davidvictorson
content: I love slot games. It is one of the games I play most of the time in both land-based and online casinos. However, I have a preference for playing slots online. My mood dictates the slot theme and game I choose to play whenever I visit an online casino.Below is a list of some of the most popular slot themes and games. Feel free to add yours.Egyptian-themed slotEye of Cleopatra. Image source:livecasino.io/Egyptian slots are some of the most iconic online casino games available on the world wide web. They feature beautifully executed Ancient Egypt themes with fascinating backdrops of golden dunes, mystical pyramids, colossal Egyptian god statues and other imagination-fuelling visuals. Some of the games include: Eye of Cleopatra, Egyptian Fortunes, Eye of Ra, and many more.Adventure-themed slotAdventures of Captain BlackJack. Image source:livecasino.io/Adventure-themed slots are  based around fascinating travel destinations, mythical tales, legends and true events. An interesting thing about them is that they feature crazy dwarves, pirates, monkeys, explorers, historical & mythical heroes and enchanting archaeological sites. Some of these games include: Adventures of Captain BlackJack, Hidden Valley, Secrets of the Temple, and many more.Animal-themed slotAnimal Madness. Image source:livecasino.io/Animal-themed slot is always exciting to play for animal lovers because it takes us into the wild plains of Africa, the exotic rainforests of South America, and the sweeping European landscape and uncover a whole new opportunity for a phenomenal reel spinning experience. Some of these games include: Animal Madness, The Great Chicken Escape, Mega Moolah, and many more.Fruit-themed slotFruit Party 2. Image source: livecasino.io/Fruit slots are known, and indeed well-loved for their basic and simple gameplay. It offers an escape for those who may not like the complicated features and graphics of other slot games. The fruit symbols will be ranked from the most common to the rarest which will pay out the most when they land in a winning combination. The gameplay is usually as simple as it comes with wins coming from landing the right combinations of symbols. Some of these games include: Fruit Party, Super Hot Fruits Megaways, Cheeky Fruits Split, and many more.TV series and Movie-themed slotMarilyn Monroe Slots. Image source: betandbeat.com/TV series and Movie-themed slot are for movie lovers who would choose to play the game based on their favourite films or shows. TV and movie themed slots are always a smash hit, and the fact that they capitalise on an already popular genre seems to add to their appeal. The characters and logos are instantly familiar, and the games often incorporate storylines that have played out in real life. Some of the more sophisticated video slots even boast cinematic style clips that come straight from the smash hit films they are based on. Some of these games include: Marilyn Monroe Slots, The Godfather, Jurassic Park, and many more.Horror-themed slotMental. Image source: livecasino.io/For decades, slot machines have been designed with horror themes. With the genre being popular with movie-goers since the early days of cinema, and the present-day popularity of vampires, werewolves and gothic themes, horror slot games are some of the most enticing games available. Some of these games include: Mental, Blood Suckers II, Lost Vegas, and many more.Viking/Asgard/Norse Mythology-themed slotAsgard. Image source: livecasino.io/Inspired by Norse mythology, the dark and cold Norse mythology themed slots are some of the favorite themed slots of my friends. They are drawn by the graphics and soundtrack. Some of these games include: Asgard, North Storm, Vikings Quests, and many more.Pirate-themed slotPirate Gold. Image source: livecasino.io/Pirate slots are one of the most popular slot themes in online casinos. The thrill of the game comes from the fun imagery of captains with parrots and monkeys to all-out slot battles amongst fleets of ships. Some of these games include: Pirate Gold, Dead Man's Trail, Rage of the Seas, and many more.Music-themed slotJimi Hendrix. Image source: slots.infoThe beauty of music themed slot is that while you play the soundtracks are blasting in the background. It leaves you with a great experience especially when you know the song. Some of these games include: Jimi Hendrix,  Guns N’ Roses slot, Samba Brazil, and many more.Alien and Space-themed slotSpace Spins. Image source:  livecasino.io/If you are a lover of Star-Wars and space adventures then the alien and space-themed slot will appeal to you. Some of these games include: Space spins, Aliens, Space Invaders, and many more.Irish-themed slotIrish Treasures. Image source: livecasino.io/Irish-themed slots are fun, colourful and enchanting. The games are inspired by Irish folklore, tradition and culture. Some of these games include: Irish Treasures, 9 Pots of Gold, Rainbow Riches, and many more.Ancient Rome-themed slotSpartacus Super Colossal Reels. Image source: slotstemple.com/The Roman empire is known for its Gladiators, its larger than life rulers, its battles and wars, luxury, power, adventure and danger. The developers of the Roman empire slot games, drew inspiration from these themes. The Roman empire provides a stunning backdrop for slot games with its iconic buildings and imposing Roman pillars such as those in the famous Coliseum and forum. Some of these games include: Spartacus Super Colossal Reels, Rome Rise of an Empire, Rome, The Golden Age, and many more. Oriental-Asian-themed slotMoney Mouse. Image source: johnslots.com/en/Oriental-Asian themed slots tend to be beautiful and relaxing. The theme is inspired by the rich oriental-asian cultures that has endured for centuries. If you love anime, dragons, and asian cultures, these games. Some of these games include: Money Mouse, Wild Chase Tokyo GO slot, Koi Princess, and many more.Christmas-themed slotChristmas Carols Megaways. Image source: livecasino.io/Inspired by the Christmas holidays, they are fun to play especially during the festive season. The game developers want players to enjoy a fun and festive gaming experience - but, on the other, they know that these games won't be played all year 'round simply because that's the nature of holiday-themed content. Some of these games include: Christmas Carols Megaways, Christmas Big Bass Bonanza, Book of Christmas, and many more.Superheroes-themed slotWonder Woman. Image source: slotstemple.com/If you are a lover of superheroes my guess is that you will be drawn to Superheroes-themed slot games. The cool thing about it is that some of the action-packed games follow the story of the hero, while others focus on the super-villains. Some of these games include: Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice, Batman Begins Excerpt: Batman Begins, Wonder Woman, and many more.Sports-themed slotFootball Glory. Image source: johnslots.com/en/Sports-themed slots are online games based around a specific sport. With the most popular sports slots being football theme other games are based on basketball, horse-racing, wrestling, rugby or even cricket. Some of these games include: Football Glory, Scudamore’s Super Stakes, The Champions, and many more.Fantasy-themed slotMermaid's Diamond. Image source: livecasino.io/Fantasy slots cover lots of different themes and styles, so you’ll never run out of new games to try. Each game is unique. They each feature different styles of animation, stories, characters, graphics and soundtracks that create an immersive fantasy experience to go along with your fun slots play. Some of these games include: Mermaid's Diamond, Troll’s Tale, Secret of the Mermaid and many more.There are so many themed slot games. Which is your favorite. Do you play a particular themed slot base on your mood?Source:https://www.johnslots.com/en/https://betandbeat.com/https://www.starburstmagazine.com/https://www.gamblingsites.com/https://www.slotstemple.com/

comments.author: Hispo
comments.body: I think my favorite among those I have seen for now is the fruit themed.I think it gives me this nostalgic feeling from the early 2010's when games like Candy Crush were at their peek of popularity among smartphone users. The super bright colors  and the cartoon art style of the fruits are quite similar to Candy Crush franchise games. It makes it more enjoyable imo.

comments.author: Jating
comments.body: Nah, no particular favorite, as long as I enjoy the game and the graphics and the audio, I will go and try and play that one. Although I will admit that I'm biased with the animal theme slot since I hit a massive win the the 50 lions. And then there is this Marvel theme slot that I used to play in a land base casinos and then the old but classic Egyptian theme which is one of the first slots that I played years ago.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: just curious about slot lovers, when looking you are looking for a slot that you want to play on, do you only focus on rewards, bonuses, odds, etc... or do you also look for certain themes on a slot? I rarely play on slots but having a great reward system is a must, but sometimes having certain themes on slot games makes the experience much more enjoyable.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on July 14, 2022, 06:10:16 PMThere are so many themed slot games.And you have done a fine job highlighting them,Quote from: Davidvictorson on July 14, 2022, 06:10:16 PM Do you play a particular themed slot base on your mood?Is it really based on mood, It seems more like our favorite slot is based on personality. Say I am the adventurous kind, It will be natural to be drawn to the Adventure-themed slot, If you love animals normally, you will be drawn towards Animal-themed slot, you love movies, your preference will be TV series and Movie-themed slot, If you love Myth, preference will be Viking/Asgard/Norse Mythology-themed slot, If you love music, your preference will be Music-themed slot, and if you love sports, your preference are the sports-themed slot etc.From these analysis , we can say also that casino's that offer a variety of slot theme options for players with different personalities will have high patronage compared to others.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I have not seen my favorite in that least,mostly because I like Knightly slots,my favorites are Swords and Holy Grail that is based on King Arthur story and The Green Knight which is based on some fair tale imagination story,both from Play n Go provider and both offer you some of the best game play mechanics I have ever seen in slot machines.The only bad thing is the high volatility which sometimes can make you very happy and most of the times can kill all of your hopes to do better or to win something.Still though this is my favorite theme slot.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: I don't have any particular preference to be honest, let's say if I'm playing on a land base casino, the first slot that is free and came to my attention and I'm familiar with it, then I will go and play regardless of what theme it is. But it is new to me, then I will still try and play and get the experience. Also I look for the bet, specially the minimum bet, because there are machines that has big minimum bet for me, so I just stay away from that machine.

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: How about Western type of slot games?1. Dead or Alive?2. Wild Buffalo?3. Bier Haus? (land based casino favorite of mine)Or anything to that effect. So currently that's the game that I played the most and they have a good multiplier too and sometimes you can hit those huge multipliers and give you a good windfall.

comments.author: darkangel11
comments.body: What about the most well known theme? It has many different names. Sometimes it's just classic slots, sometimes money pot, 777, or fruit slots. I feel like this theme is so popular that for a number of people there's no playing without it. When someone says the word slots they see those 7s spinning around and hear the sound of coins hitting the metal slide.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: nice search! it is really interesting to see how many different themes exist in the slots...most of the games try to have an endearing look. Those few times that I play I try to choose the games with the highest RTP and perhaps with the possibility of buying "bonus spin". I don't think one theme can really bring more luck than another

comments.author: Jody.Drummer
comments.body: There are still many slot games that I haven't tried, in fact every time I make a bet I only visit that relative slot game room. While there are many options, you know not all of them are comfortable enough every time you bet. For example the high winning RTP in multiple rolls is really the calculation I did. Even so, I'm really going to try some of the changes lately and explore them one by one. As a casual gambler, I mostly play classic slots.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: Quote from: Davidvictorson on July 14, 2022, 06:10:16 PMThere are so many themed slot games. Which is your favorite. Do you play a particular themed slot base on your mood?I often play Play n Go Reactoonz series so I can say I am more into alien-themed slots but I also play different pop games of Yggdrasil which have a variety of theme such as animal theme like wild pops, hippo pops, etc.   so to be more precise I think I am more attracted to the type of slots than the theme itself.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: Quote from: darkangel11 on July 14, 2022, 08:50:22 PMWhat about the most well known theme? It has many different names. Sometimes it's just classic slots, sometimes money pot, 777, or fruit slots. I feel like this theme is so popular that for a number of people there's no playing without it. When someone says the word slots they see those 7s spinning around and hear the sound of coins hitting the metal slide. Yeah, even before I got truly exposed to slot games, I was already familiar with the 777 number denotation. Perhaps it's not the most colourful but it by far had a place in the slot games as its one of the most used in movies too. We even had a 777coin gambling site on the platform, I suppose they are still around and active although, the campaign promotion they were running has calmed following certain events.Well, its important as to what team is used to present a slot game as these themes becomes click bate and some real source of advertisment. Egyptian and Old Roman themes gets me too as a lover of ancient history.

comments.author: chaser15
comments.body: I also have the same approach when playing slots. Aside from RTPs, multipliers, free spins, and everything, I'm also picky and have my own preference when choosing slot themes. Doesn't have any big reason for that but it feels like, I really attracted to a specific themes, and even think that I feel lucky when I choose my preferred one. One reason also why I became like that is because of winning experience. Luck comes with me whenever I play only my favorite themes. Nothing technical here.I always prefer Fruits themes and Chinese-based slots (classic Chinese that involves dragons, CN coins, etc) are those that I preferred. The other themes on the list seem not popular too like Animal-themed and those with Celebrities.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: honestly I didn't look at this issue of themes, when I choose a casino I choose it because of the functions and then if the casino color will not make my eyes hurt, I must admit that these themes you posted are very beautiful themes, I liked the soccer theme better because I do sports betting. it would definitely be nice to see a theme like that when I place bets. in recent times casinos have invested a lot in having beautiful designers. but they don't put much effort into having a beautiful designer in the sports betting partQuote from: chaser15 on July 14, 2022, 09:41:20 PMLuck comes with me whenever I play only my favorite themes. Nothing technical here.i think i will also start to have a favorite theme for when i make sports bets i will be luckier as lately i have been having low profit and consecutive losses so i need to have more luck maybe choosing some favorite theme can reverse my bad luck

comments.author: goinmerry
comments.body: I will also admit that slot themes play a big role in me when choosing slots. I am more attracted to fruit-based themes and Egyptian-based themes. There's a feeling in me that I'm always lucky whenever I played at those themes. Since we are just relying on luck on slot games, therefore, at least we pick themes based on our favorites. I like those flashy graphics whenever I'm hitting the free spins bonus and multipliers. Much more entertaining if the total profit after free spins is totally decent and a big win. Sometimes, I even disregard any factors just to play in my favorite slot themes.Nice effort compiling the list but there are themes that are not familiar to me or even exist. I don't even encounter some of those.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Sorry for my language.But, just want to say (F*ck the themes) ~XD I even playing some unknown theme and worst animation slot. The reason want to play the slot, just because the provider & game we can prediction for average hitting scatter and have a big max win multiplier.However, this thread is good for the themes topic.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: Majority are used with the fruit theme, and the same has made it to be the favourite. This doesn't require much of graphics, so even at low internet it runs flawless.Different concepts and stories were getting added to the slots list to attract users. The best part, some people use specific theme as their lucky ones.Already gambling depends much on luck. Once again these themes help users to be more lucky.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: No particular favorite. If I were to be forced to pick though then the most notable one for me would be fruit-themed and Egyptian-themed. Those two are by far the most memorable ones since they were one of the first themed casinos I've tried iirc. Recently though I just choose whatever attracts my eye and just play on it if I ever want to play slots. Not particularly picky about it nor do I believe that one slot theme is better for luck than the other really. I might have a specific theme in mind when playing, just that I don't really remember it and just pick it subconsciously. I just know I'm more on the attractive/brighter color schemes.

comments.author: TopT3ns
comments.body: I think the display for slot machines is not too much attention, it's just that if the management at the gambling place wants to get visitors interested in trying to use slot gambling, then it should make an attractive appearance and have sparkling lights for accessories that is very good. So give beauty in the eyes of the gamblers and after that let them play depending on their luck.
